Call JS function on slide enter.description: when slide is selected, call this function

Disable printing of slide.description: slide with this flag will NOT be printed

Slide marked as print only.description: slide with this flag will ONLY be printed

Set previous slide.description: when we go to previous slide, use this ID

Set next slide.description: when we go to next slide, use this ID

Enable overflow on slide.description: Enable overflow on slide (if content is too long for slide it will be scrollable)

Create transition on slide with replace.description: Create transition on slide with replace

Create transition on slide with x2 repla.description: Create transition on slide with x2 replace
